PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_OnSiteCastKerb
PropertySetDef.Definition: Properties for an on site cast kerb.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal height of the object. The size information is provided in addition to the shape representation and the geometric parameters used within. In cases of inconsistency between the geometric parameters and the size properties, provided in the attached property set, the geometric parameters take precedence.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal overall width of the object. The size information is provided in addition to the shape representation and the geometric parameters used within. In cases of inconsistency between the geometric parameters and the size properties, provided in the attached property set, the geometric parameters take precedence.
